verses.verse: Then <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Can a <S%H1397>man<s%> be <S%H5532>profitable<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> as he that is <S%H7919>wise<s%> may be <S%H5532>profitable<s%> to <S%H5315>himself?<s%>
Is it any <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> that you are <S%H6663>righteous?<s%> or is it <S%H1214>gain<s%> to him, that you make your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8552>perfect?<s%>
Will he <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you for <S%H3374>fear<s%> of you? will he <S%H935>enter<s%> with you into <S%H4941>judgment?<s%>
Is not your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H7227>great?<s%> and your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H369>infinite?<s%>
For you have <S%H2254>taken<s%> a <S%H2254>pledge<s%> from your <S%H251>brother<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing,<s%> and <S%H6584>stripped<s%> the <S%H6174>naked<s%> of their <S%H899>clothing.<s%>
You have not given <S%H4325>water<s%> to the <S%H5889>weary<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> and you have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> from the <S%H7456>hungry.<s%>
But as for the <S%H2220>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he had the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and the <S%H5375>honorable<s%> <S%H6440><s%> man <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in it.
You have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> away <S%H7387>empty,<s%> and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> have been <S%H1792>broken.<s%>
<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H6341>snares<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> about you, and <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H926>troubles<s%> you;
<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> that you can not <S%H7200>see;<s%> and <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> you.
Is not <S%H433>God<s%> in the <S%H1363>height<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven?<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H7218>height<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> they are!
And you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> does <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3045>know?<s%> can he <S%H8199>judge<s%> through the <S%H6205>dark<s%> <S%H6205>cloud?<s%>
Thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> are a <S%H5643>covering<s%> to him, that he <S%H7200>sees<s%> not; and he <S%H1980>walks<s%> in the <S%H2329>circuit<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
Have you <S%H8104>marked<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H734>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> have <S%H1869>trodden?<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> were <S%H7059>cut<s%> down out of <S%H6256>time,<s%> whose <S%H3247>foundation<s%> was <S%H3332>overflowed<s%> with a <S%H5104>flood:<s%>
Which <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from us: and <S%H4100>what<s%> can the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%> for them?
Yet he <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> things: but the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> from me.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and are <S%H8056>glad:<s%> and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H3932>laugh<s%> them to scorn.
<S%H518>Whereas<s%> our <S%H7009>substance<s%> is not <S%H3582>cut<s%> down, but the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of them the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumes.<s%>
<S%H5532>Acquaint<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> yourself with him, and be at <S%H7999>peace:<s%> thereby <S%H2896>good<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you.
<S%H3947>Receive,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, the <S%H8451>law<s%> from his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> up his <S%H561>words<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> you shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> up, you shall put <S%H7368>away<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from your <S%H168>tabernacles.<s%>
Then shall you <S%H7896>lay<s%> up <S%H1220>gold<s%> as <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and the gold of <S%H211>Ophir<s%> as the <S%H6697>stones<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks.<s%>
Yes, the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> shall be your <S%H1220>defense,<s%> and you shall have <S%H8443>plenty<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
For <S%H227>then<s%> shall you have your <S%H6026>delight<s%> in the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H433>God.<s%>
You shall make your <S%H6279>prayer<s%> to him, and he shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> you, and you shall <S%H7999>pay<s%> your <S%H5088>vows.<s%>
You shall also <S%H1504>decree<s%> a <S%H562>thing,<s%> and it shall be <S%H6965>established<s%> to you: and the <S%H216>light<s%> shall <S%H5050>shine<s%> on your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> men are <S%H8213>cast<s%> <S%H8213>down,<s%> then you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> There is <S%H1466>lifting<s%> up; and he shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H7807>humble<s%> person.
He shall <S%H4422>deliver<s%> the <S%H336>island<s%> of the <S%H5355>innocent:<s%> and it is <S%H4422>delivered<s%> by the <S%H1252>pureness<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
